homeSubTitleDisconnected: Connect your wallet to get started
homeSubTitleConnected: Find a Fractal above or create a new one
helperSigners: How many trusted users for this Safe?
helperSigThreshold: How many signatures are needed to pass a proposal?
subTitleTrustedAddresses: Trusted addresses are able to submit and approve proposals.
helperVotingPeriod: The length of time (in seconds) from a proposal's creation when voting can still occur.
helperQuorum: The percentage of the total possible token votes required in order for a proposal to pass.
helperProposalExecutionDelay: How many seconds after a proposal successfully passes that it must wait until it can be executed on the blockchain.
governanceDescription: These Governance Configuration values can be changed later on by passing a proposal to do so on your DAO.
helperParentAllocation: Amount of tokens to allocate to parent DAO
helperTokenName: What will your governance token be called?
helperTokenSymbol: A 5 character symbol for your token.
helperTokenSupply: The total supply of tokens. Unallocated tokens will be placed in your DAO's treasury.
descMultisigGov: Multi-signature DAO governance on a Safe contract wallet.
descUsulGov: ERC-20 token voting governance on a Safe contract wallet, powered by Usul mod.
helperFractalName: What will your DAO be called?
